text: Predrag Matvejević (7 October 1932 - 2 February 2017) was a Bosnian Croatian writer and political activist. His book, Mediterranean Breviary: A Cultural Landscape (1987), was a bestseller in many European countries. It was also translated into more than 20 languages. He was born in Mostar. Matvejević died on 2 February 2017 in Zagreb at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Yugoslavian academics Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina writers Category:Croatian writers
title: Predrag Matvejević
